channel.title: Problem with "RUN"
channel.description:
[4/10/11 5:27 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [4/10/11 5:27 PM]: java.net.BindEx ception: Address already in use: bind [4/10/11 5:27 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [4/10/11 5:27 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketC hannelImpl.java:126) [4/10/11 5:27 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdapt or.java:59) [4/10/11 5:27 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [4/10/11 5:27 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [4/10/11 5:27 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [4/10/11 5:27 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [4/10/11 5:27 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662) [4/10/11 5:27 PM]: Saving players... Press any key to continue . . .
I get this everytime I do, "Run." My Path is, "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;%path%" My ClassPath is, ".;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin"
Help?

item.title: Problem with "RUN"
item.dc:creator: @Savaqe Savaqe
item.description:
@Savaqe wrote:

Dude your fucking awesome!!!

Do you think you can help me out with one more thing?
On another server, I really can’t be descriptive, but Whenever I “Attack” something or “Teleport” or pretty much do anything exept walk, It freezes on me. Do you know what could be wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with "RUN"
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You have a program running thats occupying port 43594, like UTorrent, etc.
